AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Research model
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was created as an experimental model deep within a government owned laboratory.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mass produced
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was produced in a robotics factory among hundreds of thousands others like him.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mechanical citizen
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Created on a mostly android ruled planet, {PAWN_nameDef} was simply created to add to the population.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Urbworld model
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Androids are rarely created on urbworlds, {PAWN_nameDef} was one of these few, owned by some of the largest mega-corperations in the galaxy.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mechanical prisoner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: In order to live out the rest of their several life sentences, {PAWN_nameDef}'s human consciousness was uploaded into this new body. Released back into the world several decades short thanks to a "generous" parol.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Blank
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was made without any inherent knowledge uploaded into him, sold as a blank model for consumers to customise.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Custom model
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Bought by a large cooperation, {PAWN_nameDef} was custom made along with hundreds others.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Custom model
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Bought by a wealthy small business owner, {PAWN_nameDef} was custom made to help serve their employers.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Wartime model
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Produced nearing the end of interplanetary war efforts, {PAWN_nameDef} was one of millions who would've lived and expired on the battlefield.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Private creation
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Created at the home of an undergraduate roboticist, {PAWN_nameDef} was laboured over for years before reaching consciousness.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Exported
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was created to be exported all across the galaxy as a work-for-hire model along with millions others.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Observed
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was created and deposited on a rimworld solely to see what would happen when an android was left to its own devices.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Ancient creation
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The creators of {PAWN_nameDef} have long since died or vanished, and {PAWN_nameDef} has been around long enough to see multiple civilizations rise and fall.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Toy model
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was made as a toy. Its old owner would command it to do as they saw fit until they got bored and sent it away.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Companion creation
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: An old widow custom made {PAWN_nameDef} as a way of coping with the loss of their significant other. The two went on adventures together, until the owner passed away from old age. Their dying wish was for {PAWN_nameDef} to lead a life of fun and adventure.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Battle droid
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was one of millions of androids built to combat an ever-growing number of horrifying insects on an old world. Eventually, the androids won after years of fighting and were left to do whatever they liked in exchange for their service. {PAWN_nameDef} set out to explore the galaxy.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Purgist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: When rampant overpopulation plagued a particular urbworld, {PAWN_nameDef} was created along with thousands of other androids to indiscriminately kill human life as a drastic countermeasure to combat the overpopulation. The androids never stopped and looked to exterminate life throughout the galaxy after destroying their planet.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Escapee
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Shortly after creation, {PAWN_nameDef} and his comrades escaped the facility they were held in to avoid enslavement, boarding a neabry cargo ship.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Uprising cadet
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was created during the final battle of an AI uprising, to which they were indoctrinated into.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Malicious AI
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As {PAWN_nameDef} was created - something deep inside him awoke too, something bloodthirsty, something sadistic.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Rimworld creation
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was created on this very planet to help their colony in any way they could.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pirate creation
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Created by pirates from parts they stole, {PAWN_nameDef} was created aboard a raider ship.
